title: [Wallpapers] Death Sworn Skins!
body:
Hey everyone!

I'm trying to find a happy home for wallpaper-sized splashes, but until I find it, I thought it might be nice to post 'em here, along with the artists who made 'em! 

**Viktor** - [Alvin Lee](https://www.artstation.com/alvinlee)
**Zed** - [Kelly Aleshire](https://www.artstation.com/kaleshire)
Katarina - [Jennifer Wuestling](https://www.artstation.com/izaskun)

https://imgur.com/OG3vQgn
https://imgur.com/o9FPSKT
https://imgur.com/1HyYcHQ
